Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Kim Bowers to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Kim Bowers to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system for her employment with the town of Orchard Park Zoning Board of Appeals.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Kim Bowers to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
